## Government Tender Announcement
### EP922-240784 Panels

**Reference Number:** WS4392143413-Doc4392192551

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** March 1, 2024

**Tender Closing Date and Time:** March 26, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Overview
Public Service and Procurement Canada (PWGSC) has issued a notice of proposed procurement (NPP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to the Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC) located in Lethbridge, Alberta. This requirement falls under the Public Service and Procurement Canada Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C, specifically Product Category 1 - Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems.

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers who have a relevant supply arrangement with PWGSC. The requirements are subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Key Details
* The required office furniture must be delivered and installed by June 30, 2024.
* The tender will be conducted in accordance with PWGSC's Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.
* The selection criteria for this tender is Lowest Price.
* The tender closing date and time remains unchanged.

### Contact Information
If you have any questions regarding this tender, please contact Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC) at kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.\
